dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1964
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Homey tales of a winter visit to her daughter, the story of two old guests, and their upcoming move to a new farm. Sums up their work as the works of mercy and the works of study.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 811 1964-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
